item.title: Re: A couple corrections
item.content:encoded: That sounds a lot like something that WotC would do. i can see their recent overhauls changing that kind of stuff, and it being hidden under all the more breaking changes and erratas

item.title: Re: A couple corrections
item.content:encoded: I've noticed that quite a few of the spells there are ones I've added recently. I think a lot of these "errors" are in line with how they appear in the books. WotC has been implementing subtle changes to the way spells and stat blocks are written in new publications, so it might be the case that all the spells on here might have to be edited to be in line with newer printings.

item.title: Re: A couple corrections
item.content:encoded:
new laundry list
The inconsistency if spell schools are uppercase 64or lowercase (1st-level conjuration vs 1st-level conjuration)
There's also the special case when cantrips are involved cause they are expressed as Conjuration cantrip
It seems like the current norm is lowercase for spells , but uppercase for cantrips

So the following spells break parity
Ashardalon's Stride lvl 3 Transmutation
Borrowed Knowledge lvl 2 Divination
Catnap lvl 3 Enchantment
Distort Value lvl 1 Illusion
Draconic Transformation lvl 7 Transmutation
Fizban's Platinum Shield lvl 6 Abjuration
Flame Stride (UA) lvl 3 Transmutation
Kinetic Jaunt lvl 2 Transmutation
Nathair's Mischief lvl 2 Illusion
Raulothim's Psychic Lance lvl 4 Enchantment
Rime's Binding Ice lvl 2 Evocation
Silvery Barbs lvl 1 Enchantment
Summon Draconic Spirit lvl 5 Conjuration
Vortex Warp lvl 2 Conjuration
Wither and Bloom lvl 2 Necromancy

And for cantrips only
On/Off (UA) cantrip (technomagic)
breaks the standard as it straight up doesnt have a school and according to the UA it comes from it should be Transmutation

Yes, before you wonder i definitely automated the looking for of this things

item.title: Re: A couple corrections
item.content:encoded:
Erupting Earth at higher levels is incorrect.
It says: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d12 for each slot level above 2nd.
It should say: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d12 for each slot level above 3rd.

item.title: A couple corrections
item.content:encoded:
Creation's casting time is incorrectly set as 1 action. Should be 1 minute.
Tenser's Transformation is correctly 1 action in the body of the page, but in the tags is "Special" instead.

Also several minor typos I've noticed (bolded for emphasis):
On the front page, the Dragon Wings racial feat is spelled "Dragon Winga", although it's correct on its actual page.
The Components section for Earthquake says "a pinch o f dirt, a piece o f rock"
Dark Star description includes two typos right next to each other "A creature with darkvision can't set though the magical darkness", should be see through
Illusory Dragon has a random apostrophe in the description "taking '7d6 damage"
Vedalken race has a space in the middle of a word "Whenever you make an ability check with the chosen s kill or tool"

Maddening Darkness used em dashes in the description instead of hyphens which isn't really a typo but just looks weird. "60—foot—radius"
